title: Pit Price: The Quilting Crusader

story.text: Pit Price begins his week as usual, tutoring children in mathematics and science. In the midst of a session, he overhears news of a planned heist at the local museum.
Intrigued by the news, Pit uses his knowledge of geometry to analyze the museum's blueprints, quilting a map to plan a countermove.
Dressed in a quilted cape, Pit stakes out the museum. He uses his calculating wit to set traps, creating a maze of confusing paths out of fabric strands.
As the thieves break in, they become disoriented by the maze. Pit uses this opportunity to alert the authorities and keep the thieves at bay with confusing math riddles.
With the thieves apprehended, Pit's actions make the local news. He modestly credits his quilting skills and passion for tutoring as the keys to his success.
Inspired by his heroics, the community starts a 'Quilt for Safety' program, encouraging the crafting of quilts that double as safety tools.
Pit spends a quiet day at home, quilting a new cape and preparing for any future threats, always ready to protect his community.

ending: Thus, Pit Price once again proved that even the most humble hobbies can be the foundation of extraordinary heroism.
